comments:
Description:
Dataset based on BIRT sample db cannot be created in linux ws3.

Steps to reproduce:
1. new a report
2. create a sample data source
3. create a dataset

expected result:
Dataset is created.

Actual result:
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/eclipse/birt/report/engine/api/script/instance/IDataSetInstance
